attributes.action: Radical social and economic change should be debated in Parliament and anti-capitalist arguments should be featured more prominently on the BBC
attributes.additional_details:
Politicians should acknowledge and debate the significant flaws of capitalism, and the need for radical social and economic change in the UK and across the globe, in Parliament - to avoid the next catastrophic global crisis of capitalism, the environmental crises and to help relieve mass inequality and exploitation across the world.

The BBC should feature anti-capitalist arguments and debates more widely/prominently across it's network.
